Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Djedher with painted decoration: a dark blue lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard, incised parallel hands holding a dark blue adze and the cord of a seed-bag which hangs over the shoulder, the front of the legs are inscribed with blue painted Hieroglyphs(now very worn), there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the feet.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Somerset Lowry-Corry, 2nd Earl of Belmore
